body:
Magarena 1.26, Debian Linux (Wheezy)

In my game I cast Vampire Outcasts with kicker, so it got +2/+2. I was greatly disappointed to find they could neither attack or block. I don't know why. They had Lifelink and could save me from the defeat.
author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)
title: Vampire Outcasts couldn't attack or block

comments.body: Vampire Outcasts doesn't have kicker. Are you referring to the bloodthirst ability on Vampire Outcasts or a different card altogether?
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body:
Oops. Yes, no kicker but they have Bloodthirst 2. I'm 100% sure it was this card, the ones with Lifelink.

It occured in several turns. First, I was unable to  block with them. Then in next turn, I wasn't able to select them for attackers. And then unable to block. I couldn't see any enchantment and I went through graveyards as well.
comments.author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)

content:
_From [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/) on June 18, 2012 16:57:07_

Magarena 1.26, Debian Linux (Wheezy)

In my game I cast Vampire Outcasts with kicker, so it got +2/+2. I was greatly disappointed to find they could neither attack or block. I don't know why. They had Lifelink and could save me from the defeat.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=230_
